header.title: Trailkin
header.tagline: Your adventure starts at your doorstep

quickstart.title: The Adventure in 60 Seconds
quickstart.subtitle: Boredom begone! Turn your walk into a story.
quickstart.step1_desc: One Guide (Storyteller) narrates, the others are Explorers (Knight, Wizard) and the dog is the loyal companion.
quickstart.step2_desc: The easiest: A collection quest. Find 3 magical items (e.g., a 'Dragon Scale' = a pointy stone).
quickstart.step3_desc: A stick becomes a magic wand, a puddle becomes a swamp monster. Imagination is key!
quickstart.step4_desc: When things get tricky, the Explorer creatively describes how they succeed. The Guide decides the outcome.
quickstart.important_desc: There are no wrong ideas! The goal is to kill boredom and have fun. Let your imagination run wild.

rules.title: Adventure Guide
rules.subtitle: Ideas to make the walk more exciting.
rules.moduleA_intro: Use these when you want to leave things to chance.
rules.moduleA_rps_desc: Explorer vs Guide. Win = Great success. Loss = Funny mishap. Tie = Partial success.
rules.moduleA_luck_desc: Odds or Evens with fingers or the Color Oracle (next car that passes).
rules.moduleA_skill_desc: Balance across a stretch or throw a pinecone at a target.
rules.moduleB_clock_desc: Set a real-world goal as a timer.
rules.moduleB_pressure_example: We must find X before we reach the bridge!
rules.moduleB_accumulation_example: With each failure, the evil wizard gets one step closer!
rules.moduleC_states_desc: A failure gives a funny condition.
rules.moduleC_negative_example: Itchy curse! You must hop on one leg until further notice.
rules.moduleC_positive_example: Strong from a sip of brook water! Your next check succeeds automatically.
rules.moduleC_fail_desc: A failure never stops the story! It just makes it more interesting.

inspiration.title: Idea Generator
inspiration.subtitle: Choose your environment and get spontaneous ideas for magical transformations.

quest.title: Quest Generator
quest.subtitle: No idea for today? Let us create a collection quest for you!
quest.hint_desc: Creating a quest will redirect you to the group overview, where the quest is saved.
